Let me write the Dockerfile now.","time":{"start":1771660830133,"end":1771660830133}}}
{"type":"tool_use","timestamp":1771660830135,"sessionID":"ses_380c9629affeUrAgkdWw6HWFFj","part":{"id":"prt_c7f36e5ae001vx1Ow6IqzFMcbR","sessionID":"ses_380c9629affeUrAgkdWw6HWFFj","messageID":"msg_c7f369daa00170a9ipb1uP3mq6","type":"tool","callID":"call_e46359a00ffb4ffb87dae975","tool":"write","state":{"status":"error","input":{"content":"# Build stage
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jdk-alpine AS builder

# Create working directory
WORKDIR /build

# Copy Maven configuration and dependencies
COPY pom.xml .
COPY src ./src

# Build the application (includes compile + package)
RUN mvn clean package -DskipTests

# Runtime stage
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre-alpine

# Install system dependencies for fonts and curl
RUN apk add --no-cache \
    fontconfig \
    ttf-dejavu \
    curl \
    tzdata

# Import AWS RDS root CA certificate
RUN keytool -importcert -trustcacerts -alias aws-rds-ca \
    -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/AWS_RDS_ROOT_CA.pem \
    -keystore /etc/ssl/certs/java/cacerts \
    -storepass changeit -noprompt

# Import Azure DigiCert certificate
RUN keytool -importcert -trustcacerts -alias azure-digicert \
    -file /usr/share/ca-certificates/AZURE_DIGICERT.pem \
    -keystore /etc/ssl/certs/java/cacerts \
    -storepass changeit -noprompt

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup -g 1001 app && \
    adduser -D -u 1001 -G app app && \
    mkdir -p /app && \
    chown -R app:app /app

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy JAR from builder
COPY --from=builder /build/target/*.jar /app/app.jar

# Switch to non-root user
USER app

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1

# Run the application
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/bin/run-app"]
